languages.text: {n}Глаза Ардженты непрестанно обшаривают окружение, будто в поисках скрытых врагов. Даже когда она останавливает взгляд на вашем лице, это выражение не исчезает.{/n} "Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза Ардженты непрестанно обшаривают окружение, будто в поисках скрытых врагов. Даже когда она останавливает взгляд на вашем лице, это выражение не исчезает.{/n} "Вольный Торговец".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Ардженты непрестанно обшаривают окружение, будто в поисках скрытых врагов. Даже когда она останавливает взгляд на вашем лице, это выражение не исчезает.{/n} "Вольный Торговец".

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta escudriña incesantemente los alrededores, como si buscase enemigos emboscados. Su expresión no se inmuta ni siquiera al cruzar la mirada contigo.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta escudriña incesantemente los alrededores, como si buscase enemigos emboscados. Su expresión no se inmuta ni siquiera al cruzar la mirada contigo.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの目は隠れた敵を探すかのように、周囲を絶え間なく見回している。こちらの存在に気づいても、彼女の表情は変わらない。{/n}「自由開拓者」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの目は隠れた敵を探すかのように、周囲を絶え間なく見回している。こちらの存在に気づいても、彼女の表情は変わらない。{/n}「自由開拓者」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的眼睛不停地扫视周围，仿佛在寻找隐藏的敌人。即便她的目光落在你身上时，她的表情也没有发生变化。{/n}“行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的眼睛不停地扫视周围，仿佛在寻找隐藏的敌人。即便她的目光落在你身上时，她的表情也没有发生变化。{/n}“行商浪人。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux d'Argenta balaient continuellement les alentours, comme si elle cherchait des ennemis cachés. Son visage conserve la même expression, même lorsque son regard tombe sur vous.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux d'Argenta balaient continuellement les alentours, comme si elle cherchait des ennemis cachés. Son visage conserve la même expression, même lorsque son regard tombe sur vous.{/n} « {mfLlibre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Augen suchen unaufhörlich die Umgebung ab, als würde sie nach verborgenen Feinden suchen. Selbst, als ihr Blick auf dir landet, ändert sich ihre Miene nicht.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Augen suchen unaufhörlich die Umgebung ab, als würde sie nach verborgenen Feinden suchen. Selbst, als ihr Blick auf dir landet, ändert sich ihre Miene nicht.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}Argenta, saklı düşmanlarını arar gibi durmaksızın etrafına göz gezdiriyor. Bakışlarını sana çevirdiğinde dahi yüz ifadesi değişmiyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's eyes rove unceasingly over her surroundings as if searching for hidden enemies. Even when her gaze lands on you, her face does not alter.{/n} "Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta saklı düşmanlarını arar gibi durmaksızın etrafına göz gezdiriyor. Bakışlarını sana çevirdiğinde dahi yüz ifadesi değişmiyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
